name: Cells
tagline: Simulating a multicellular system with a phase-field model
body:
## About
This project is hosted by the [CFisUC](http://cfisuc.fis.uc.pt/) at the [University of Coimbra](www.uc.pt) and consists in a phase-field model for tumor metastasis mechanism. In this version we have implemented the superficial tension and adhesive interaction between the cells and an algorithm to accelerate the numerical integration of a system with several order parameters.

### Next features:
 - Biological Membrane;
 - Elasticity;
 - Traction forces.

![alt tag](https://moreirasm.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/vid.gif?w=320)
